attributes.action: leave the EU as soon as possible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EU is an unworkable, undemocratic monolith which serves no purpose to the UK citizen. The billions of pounds spent on the EU annually would be better spent on the UK NHS, armed forces, education, prisons and police.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
